main event: A witness reported seeing a light in the sky that was larger and brighter than a star, which initially appeared stationary before moving rapidly away.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 30 seconds., The object was reported to be brighter than the brightest stars., The object was seen clearly during the night., The witness believed the object was not a conventional aircraft., The witness was questioned by an Air Force officer after the report.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
witness description: Only one witness reported the sighting to the Air Force.
